TextLibrary.Text: Lumina is in an information war with Quesada.
Lumina is in an information war with Quesada.
Sounds strange. What is an information war?
It is a shadow war really. Neither side will make any official move against the other but both are seeking superiority through both ancient and modern secrets.
It is a shadow war really. Neither side will make any official move against the other but both are seeking superiority through both ancient and modern secrets.
Huh. Where's Sable? He's usually the one to tell me this kind of stuff, not you.
Interesting. How are you and I going to be involved in this?

Sable isn't the one you need for this task. I, however, am relevent to this task because Lumina has asked that we find a way to encrypt databanks throughout Lumina space to protect the information from being gathered by Quesadan "Seekers".
I am relevent to this task because Lumina has asked that we find a way to encrypt databanks throughout Lumina space to protect the information from being gathered by Quesadan "Seekers".
So we've been given coordinates and we are to simply fly to these locations and encrypt the data before anyone gets to it? Sounds easy.
So we've been given coordinates and we are to simply fly to these locations and encrypt the data before anyone gets to it? Sounds easy.

Indeed, it will require only a minority of my processing cycles to complete. However, Quesadan ships are already searching for this data. If we run into any, we are contractually obligated to eliminate them.

Indeed, it will require only a minority of my processing cycles to complete. However, Quesadan ships are already searching for this data. If we run into any, we are contractually obligated to eliminate them.
Just leave that to me then.
The Quesadans have helped us in the past. I don't like the idea of attacking them now. On the other hand, they are invading Lumina's territory so I suppose it is only fair.
We will need to report back to Lumina's Ministry of Technology to receive our reward when we've finished.

Your moral logic is unintersting to me, but it is factually correct that Lumina is implying hositilites by seeking private information in Lumina space. We will need to report back to Lumina's Ministry of Technology to receive our reward when we've finished.
